lessons.name: Major Scales
lessons.description: Learn basic major scales for beginners
lessons.task: Play through all the notes of the scale
lessons.hint: All major scales follow the same step pattern starting from the main key of the scale. Whole Whole Half Whole Whole Whole Half.

lessons.name: Minor Scales
lessons.description: Learn basic minor scales for beginners
lessons.task: Play through all the notes of the scale
lessons.hint: All major scales follow the same step pattern starting from the main key of the scale. Whole Half Whole Whole  Half Whole Whole.

lessons.name: Chords in C Major Scale
lessons.description: Learn all the chords in a C major scale and how to find them.
lessons.task: Play all the notes of the chord.
lessons.hint: To create chords within a scale, select every other note starting from the desired root note. For example, in the C major scale, to create a D minor chord, you start with D (the 2nd note), then skip E and take F (the 4th note), skip G and take A (the 6th note). This gives you the notes D, F, and A, forming the D minor chord.
